Annotation Interface ProjectInfo.Launcher

Enclosing class:
ProjectInfo
@Target({}) public static @interface ProjectInfo.Launcher
Module launcher configuration.
See Also:
ModuleLauncher

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    String
    module
    Returns module name of a main module.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String
    command
    Returns command name, or "*" for using the name of the project.
    String
    mainClass
    Returns possibly empty name of the main class.
